description: A property of a workflow specification node shall be defined as a workflow specification node property.
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: contains
contents.description: The child workflow specification node properties of this workflow specification node property.

contents.name: mapsTo
contents.description: If the workflow specification node supports a workflow specification node type, the workflow specification node type property is applied in this workflow specification node property(s).

contents.name: value
contents.description: The value, set of values, or range of the property.

contents.name: valueUnitOfMeasure
contents.description: The unit of measure of the associated property value
